//ASCII Hourglass
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline void output(char str[],long long n)
{
    long long i;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        printf("%c",str[i]);
    printf("\n");
}
int main()
{
    long long n,i;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    char str[2*n+1],str2[2*n+1];
    for(i=0;i<2*n;i++)
    {
        str[i]='*';
        str2[i]='*';
    }
    output(str,2*n);
    for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
    {
        str[i]='-';
        str[2*n-1-i]='-';
        output(str,2*n);
    }
    output(str,2*n);
    for(i=n-1;i>1;i--)
    {
        str[i]='-';
        str[2*n-1-i]='-';
        str[i-1]=str[2*n-i]='*';
        output(str,2*n);
    }
    output(str2,2*n);

    return 0;
}
